# I have successfully moved to the new position at (x=-15.0, y=25.0).
# 
# Now, I will attempt to place the stone furnace again at this location, as I should now be within the valid distance for placement.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=-15.0, y=25.0))  # Placing the stone furnace at this position.
